Sentencas: The stability of the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) cathode material Ba(0.5)Sr(0.5)Co(0.8)Fe(0.2)O(3-delta) in CO(2)-containing atmospheres (4 x 10(-4) <= pCO2/bar <= 5 x 10(-2)) is investigated by precision thermogravimetry (TG) and mass spectrometry (MS) as a function of temperature (20 <= T/degrees C <= 950).
Titulo: Stability of the SOFC cathode material (Ba,Sr)(Co,Fe)O3-δ in CO2-containing atmospheres

Sentencas: The desorption of O(2) and CO(2) from samples with different pretreatments is compared.
Titulo: Stability of the SOFC cathode material (Ba,Sr)(Co,Fe)O3-δ in CO2-containing atmospheres

Sentencas: Oxygen exchange at 300 < T/degrees C < 700 is significantly impaired by CO(2)-containing atmospheres.
Titulo: Stability of the SOFC cathode material (Ba,Sr)(Co,Fe)O3-δ in CO2-containing atmospheres

Sentencas: At 600 degrees C the kinetics of carbonate formation in CO(2)-rich atmosphere is described by a linear-parabolic rate law.
Titulo: Stability of the SOFC cathode material (Ba,Sr)(Co,Fe)O3-δ in CO2-containing atmospheres

Sentencas: A pronounced dependence of the rate constant on the CO2 content is suggested.
Titulo: Stability of the SOFC cathode material (Ba,Sr)(Co,Fe)O3-δ in CO2-containing atmospheres

Sentencas: Temperature cycles at 0 <= pCO(2)/bar <= 5 x 10(-2) and pO(2) =
Titulo: Stability of the SOFC cathode material (Ba,Sr)(Co,Fe)O3-δ in CO2-containing atmospheres

Sentencas: 0.2 bar, which show effects due to oxygen exchange of the perovskite and due to CO(2), are analyzed based on reference experiments in a CO(2)-free atmosphere, and under consideration of the TG-MS results.
Titulo: Stability of the SOFC cathode material (Ba,Sr)(Co,Fe)O3-δ in CO2-containing atmospheres

Sentencas: The decomposition temperature of the carbonate in contact with an atmosphere of pCO(2) = 5 x 10(-2) bar amounts to 807 degrees C. Complementary, the impact of carbonate formation on the oxygen exchange kinetics is investigated by conductivity relaxation measurements.
Titulo: Stability of the SOFC cathode material (Ba,Sr)(Co,Fe)O3-δ in CO2-containing atmospheres

Sentencas: A severe degradation of the surface oxygen exchange coefficient is observed after 3-10 days of exposure to ambient air.
Titulo: Stability of the SOFC cathode material (Ba,Sr)(Co,Fe)O3-δ in CO2-containing atmospheres

Sentencas: Regeneration and activation of the oxygen exchange kinetics is demonstrated after treatment in a CO(2)-free atmosphere at 825 degrees C. (C) 2008 The Electrochemical Society.
Titulo: Stability of the SOFC cathode material (Ba,Sr)(Co,Fe)O3-δ in CO2-containing atmospheres
